result.title: Policy Recommendations & Best Practices for Internal Electricity & Retail Market
result.description:
This deliverable will report on evaluation of the performance of the retail energy markets, considering both the supply and demand side and analyzing the principles of the competition / innovation and of consumer involvement.
Success Criteria: the document should include the identified utility industry and market structures that offer the best opportunity for the development of eDream solutions.
Associated Task: T8.4.
